tool_description: This API provides a simple service to send random cat facts to users.

api_list.name: Get some random facts
api_list.description: Retrieve one or more random cat facts.

optional_parameters.name: animal_type
optional_parameters.description: Type of animal the fact will describe. Default is 'cat'.

optional_parameters.name: amount
optional_parameters.description: Number of facts to retrieve. If set to one, the response will be a single fact object. If many, the response will be an array of facts. Default is 1, with a limit of 500.
